text: Anɨb agelak, Jisas yek ak amɨl agɨlak, Tisa, chɨn nopun, nad bɨ nɨŋɨd yɨbɨl nep apan agɨlak. Bɨawl yɨb okok sek, binɨb yokɨp okok sek kɨlop nɨŋɨd ma pɨlɨkɨpan agɨlak. God agup tek nep nɨŋɨd, binɨb okok kɨlop yɨpɨd gɨl yɨbɨl agñɨban agɨlak. Anɨb ak chɨnop agñan. Chɨn tay gɨnɨgun agɨlak? Lom gapman bɨnonɨm nop takis ñɨnɨgun akaŋ, mel agɨlak.
